meanings.sent1: The sticky substance was gluelike and hard to remove from my fingers.
meanings.sent2: The art project required a gluelike adhesive to hold the pieces together.
meanings.sent3: The gluelike consistency of the soup made it difficult to pour into the bowl.
meanings.sent4: Her attachment to the old house was gluelike, refusing to let go of the memories.
meanings.sent5: The gluelike bond between the two friends was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Having the consistency or texture of glue.
meanings.sent1: The dough was gluelike, sticking to the rolling pin.
meanings.sent2: The mixture had a gluelike texture that made it perfect for the craft project.
meanings.sent3: The gluelike feel of the mud squishing between my toes was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room was so thick and gluelike, you could almost touch it.
meanings.sent5: The gluelike bond between the team members helped them work together seamlessly.
